description.en:
Biohazard 3: Last Escape is a series of Hong Kong manhua (Chinese-language comics) written as a tie-in to Resident Evil 3: Nemesis. It was published by SkyWalker Comics.

Volume Titles (if blank, there is none):
1.
2. 狙擊者NEMESIS – Sniper NEMESIS
3. T-002 VS G-VIRUS
4. 再戰狙擊者 – Fighter
5. 不死之謎 – Undead Mystery
6. UMBRELLA的秘密 – Umbrella's Secret
7. 初會掘土者 – Junior Excavator
8. LEON S. KENNEDY
9. 戰死 – War Dead
10. 最強之戰 – The Strongest Battle
11.
12. T細菌 – T Bacteria
13. 第四生還者 – 4th Survivor
14. 終極兵器 – Ultimate Weapon
15. 喋血雙雄 – Blood Stasis
16. 戰G3 – Battle G3
17. 復仇 – Revenge
18. 屍横遍野 – Corpse
19-20. MINI GAME
21. 愛與痛 – Love and Pain
22. 悲哭 – Sad Cry
23. 甦醒 – Wake
24. 最後逃亡 – Last Escape
25. 最終形態 – Final Form
26. 結局 – Ending

Note: 26 Volumes
[url=http://residentevil.wikia.com/wiki/BIOHAZARD_3_LAST_ESCAPE_(manhua)]Resident Evil Wiki[/url]
